name: LiveWireLabs
description:
Big talent combined with a process-centric approach is our secret to simple, responsive and quality mobile and web solutions.
Led by a British expat, we have a very long-term and sustainable ethos, often different to other development firms in the region. Our entire philosophy is on client retention, we achieve this by always striving to exceed expectations.

Our core competency is EXECUTION. If you want to work with a company serious about deadlines, quality work and a team of talented individuals, stop looking!
